channel.title: Webclient error need help badly! *unsolved!*
channel.description:
so i uploaded my html, my .jar, my .zip, and yet i still get an error when going to the webclient link, i did use the search button, i found some answers, but they really dont make sense, could someone please help? [code]load: class client.class not found. java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: client.class at sun.plugin2.applet.Applet2ClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2ClassLoader.loadCode(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2Manager.createApplet(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2Manager$AppletExecutionRunnable.run(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) Caused by: java.io.FileNotFoundException: C:\Users\Hago\Desktop\client\class.class (The system cannot find the path specified) at java.io.FileInputStream.open(Native Method) at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at sun.net.www.protocol.file.FileURLConnection.connect(Unknown Source) at sun.net.www.protocol.file.FileURLConnection.getInputStream(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Applet2ClassLoader.getBytes(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Applet2ClassLoader.access$000(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Applet2ClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) ... 7 more Exception: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: client.class load: class client.class not found. java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: client.class at sun.plugin2.applet.Applet2ClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2ClassLoader.loadCode(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2Manager.createApplet(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2Manager$AppletExecutionRunnable.run(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) Caused by: java.io.FileNotFoundException: C:\Users\Hago\Desktop\client\class.class (The system cannot find the path specified) at java.io.FileInputStream.open(Native Method) at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at sun.net.www.protocol.file.FileURLConnection.connect(Unknown Source) at sun.net.www.protocol.file.FileURLConnection.getInputStream(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Applet2ClassLoader.getBytes(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Applet2ClassLoader.access$000(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Applet2ClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) ... 7 more Exception: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: client.class load: class client.class not found. java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: client.class at sun.plugin2.applet.Applet2ClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2ClassLoader.loadCode(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2Manager.createApplet(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2Manager$AppletExecutionRunnable.run(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) Caused by: java.io.IOException: open HTTP connection failed:http://microscape.servebbs.com:90/client/class.class at sun.plugin2.applet.Applet2ClassLoader.getBytes(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Applet2ClassLoader.access$000(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Applet2ClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) ... 7 more Exception: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: client.class [/code]
I KNOW IT CANT FIND THE client.class, HOW CAN I FIX IT IS MY QUESTION?

item.title: Webclient error need help badly! *unsolved!*
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

stickywicky:

btw i heard you have t have a hosted site not a free site like feewebs

no, that has nothing to do with it, i have a site to put my webclient on, it opens the webclient page, just i get an error on that page…

item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

nope its there, i extracted it out, put it on the desktop to be sure.
i have the regular client with all the .class files there
AND i have the .jar file as well
and still it says it cannot locate the file! here is my html code:

[code]

JrubScape [/code] yes i uploaded the client.jar as you can see the link to it.

item.title: Webclient error need help badly! *unsolved!*
item.dc:creator: @neil1111 neil1111
item.description:
@neil1111 wrote:

C:\Users\Hago\Desktop\client\class.class

make sure the client.class is still there though.^
in the client folder on your desktop, i think thats why its telling you that its not there

item.title: Webclient error need help badly! *unsolved!*
item.dc:creator: @neil1111 neil1111
item.description:
@neil1111 wrote:

never done a webclient before, but it might be something to do with this

Caused by: java.io.FileNotFoundException: C:\Users\Hago\Desktop\client\class.class (The system cannot find the path specified)

i think it means the file is not there anymore.
check that client.class is still in the client folder and the path is correct.

Read full topic
